title: Strengthening e-Learning Practical Competencies: Biomedical Informatics Multimedia Project-Based Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental medical terminology and comprehension of mathematical statistics concepts
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can apply mathematical models required to identify statistical patterns in biomedical data.
Learners can complete projects visualizing temporal changes in biomedical information using multimedia tools.
Learners can improve biomedical analysis models at least twice based on formative assessment feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
